name: OHM
description:
OHM is a tiny action- platformer made for #UOGBJAM.

  • Left and Right to move
  • A to jump
  • S to attack
  • Escape to pause the game

There is an option that allows you to switch colors between the blue/orange set and the original gameboy colors! :)

Have fun! :)

A game made by Clément "Bronislaw" Nowacki.  

Pixelarts and sounds are my own.
